mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.zh AS "zh", a.xxbh AS "xxbh", a.fzlb AS "fzlb", a.zhbh AS "zhbh", a.zhrs AS "zhrs", a.ksxh AS "ksxh", a.jsxh AS "jsxh", a.dl AS "dl", a.dlid AS "dlid", a.memo AS "memo", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10", a.creator AS "creator", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.ver AS "ver", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.updator AS "updator", a.state AS "state"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_fzsz( owid, zh, xxbh, fzlb, zhbh, zhrs, ksxh, jsxh, dl, dlid, memo, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10, creator, createtime, ver, updator_name, lastupdate, delflg, dept_id, dept_path, vertime, creator_name, updator, state ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{zh}, #{xxbh}, #{fzlb}, #{zhbh}, #{zhrs}, #{ksxh}, #{jsxh}, #{dl}, #{dlid}, #{memo}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10}, #{creator}, #{createtime}, #{ver}, #{updatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{delflg}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{vertime}, #{creatorName}, #{updator}, #{state} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_fzsz SET owid = #{owid}, zh = #{zh}, xxbh = #{xxbh}, fzlb = #{fzlb}, zhbh = #{zhbh}, zhrs = #{zhrs}, ksxh = #{ksxh}, jsxh = #{jsxh}, dl = #{dl}, dlid = #{dlid}, memo = #{memo}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10}, creator = #{creator}, createtime = #{createtime}, ver = #{ver}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, delflg = #{delflg}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, vertime = #{vertime}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, updator = #{updator}, state = #{state} WHERE owid = #{owid}
